title: Paleo-Hebrew Mega Root Pack
description: An expanded collection of reconstructed Hebrew roots with Paleo-style semantic explanations.

roots.summary_meaning: This root draws on the imagery of Aleph and expresses ideas connected to strength, leader, first.
roots.paleo_semantic_explanation: In a Paleo-Hebrew frame, the root אב would be pictured through the core themes of Aleph: strength, leader, first, ox, power. These layers shape how the word group expresses action, identity, and covenant reality in Scripture.
